overview: Mike Plumer is AltiGen’s Vice President of Sales joined AltiGen in 1996, serving in numerous positions of increasing management responsibility, ultimately being promoted to Vice President of Sales in 2000. In his role, Mr. Plumer is responsible for all direct and channel sales activities worldwide. Mr. Plumer has been instrumental in developing AltiGen’s sales channel and in leading the company’s new direct sales initiative into mid-market and enterprise accounts. Prior to serving as VP of Sales, Mr. Plumer held the positions of Senior Director of National Sales and Eastern Regional Manager. Mr. Plumer holds a bachelor’s degree in Journalism and Public Relations from Iowa State University.
